channel.title: Client error code please help
channel.description: i keep getting this code and cant load my client for my server please help my skype is korey.cowan it has a mine craft guy sleeping as pic [code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.UnsupportedClassVersionError: Loader : Unsu pported major.minor version 52.0 at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass1(Native Method) at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at java.security.SecureClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader.access$100(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.launcher.LauncherHelper.checkAndLoadMain(Unknown Source) Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

item.title: Client error code please help
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

major.minor (That just explains the what each number is, before/after the decimal) Version 52.0 is Java 8.0â€¦

You need to get java 8.
Make sure to get the jdk appropriate for your machine, and change your environmental variables.

Read full topic

item.title: Client error code please help
item.dc:creator: @the_long_ko the long ko
item.description:

i keep getting this code and cant load my client for my server please help my skype is korey.cowan it has a mine craft guy sleeping as pic
